com.datamelt.util

Class Row

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.datamelt.util.Row
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class Row
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    the row class represents a row in an ASCII file. it contains an array of fields according to the fields of the line/row.
    Author:
    uwe geercken
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
